translations: n．尖叫声：尖锐、高声的惊叫或尖叫。
· The shrieks of the children playing outside could be heard from inside the house.
从屋内可以听到外面玩耍的孩子们的尖叫声。
v．尖叫，惊叫：发出尖锐、高声的惊叫或尖叫。
· The girl shrieks when she sees the spider.
女孩看到蜘蛛时尖叫起来。

sentences.sentence: There were shrieks of embarrass we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao , mingled with giggles, from some of the girls as they struggled to protect their modesty.
sentences.translation: 有些女孩子努力要保持端庄，但还是发出了尴尬的尖叫声，其中还夹杂着咯咯的笑声。

sentences.sentence: Laughter, shrieks, howls, catcalls, hand-clapping followed this parade.
sentences.translation: 笑声、尖叫声、嚎叫声、嘘声、掌声随着游行而来。

sentences.sentence: This time there were TWO little shrieks,and more sounds of broken glass.
sentences.translation: 这次传来了两小声尖叫，还有更多玻璃的破碎声。
